name: Asylum Escape - Parkour + Puzzle ( Prototype )
description:
Asylum Escape is a prototype game
I want to share with you my 'idea' and i want to know if you like this concept.I would love to make a finished game with this idea if you like.Any idea is welcome.
Story:
You worked for the government in a madhouse and after many years you decided you couldn't stand to see what was going on there. You decided to resign and tell the world what was going on there, and the government found out, so you were caught and brought as a patient to this asylum.
After a while, your best friend decided to do the same ... so he was brought here.
One day, some people revolted and escaped. Then it was the perfect time to escape with your friend.
Your mission is to find your friend and escape together.
